resources.string: Andrew is a product developer, with 2+ years commercial experience in the tech industry. He is mostly comfortable with backend and mobile work, with an interest for frontend too. Andrew is always open to learning new languages, primarily uses Agile methodologies when carrying out his work, and has plenty of experience interacting with clients in a professional manner. Outside of work, Andrew is a 400m Hurdler, trains 6 days a week and enjoys the challenges that come with Athletics training, travelling abroad for competitions and representing his club.
